header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Backend-leaning full-stack engineer with 6+ years building fault-tolerant, real-time distributed systems processing millions of actions daily. Proven expertise architecting scalable API platforms, event-driven systems, and mission-critical infrastructure with startup-level velocity and end-to-end ownership. AWS certified with hands-on experience modernizing legacy systems, designing backwards-compatible schemas, and building greenfield platforms that can handle large scale.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Architected and maintained a real-time streaming data platform processing millions of events daily across 50+ engineering teams, supporting Disney+ and Hulu subscribers with 99.9% uptime guarantees

Built fault-tolerant state management systems using AWS Kinesis, DynamoDB, and PostgreSQL with automatic failover, consumer offset tracking, and zero-downtime deployments for critical content metadata serving downstream services

Designed scalable REST APIs and event-driven architectures powering real-time data pipelines from ingestion through Spark processing to data lake storage, enabling analytics teams to query billions of records

Developed a comprehensive schema registry with backwards and forwards compatibility validation ensuring safe evolution of data contracts across distributed microservices, preventing production incidents from breaking changes

Implemented multi-language code generation pipelines producing Python, Java, and Scala artifacts with JSON and Protobuf serialization, serving as foundational infrastructure for cross-team integrations
Built data lineage tracking using OpenLineage and Marquez, developing Java agents that hook into running applications to automatically publish metadata for complex data pipeline observability

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Engineered core blockchain platform at early-stage startup for ethical supply chain verification, operating with startup velocity and complete end-to-end ownership from infrastructure to user-facing features

Developed highly available distributed systems using Scala Akka actors with TCP-based peer-to-peer networking, implementing consensus algorithms and fault-tolerance mechanisms for 24/7 blockchain node operations

Built a transaction streaming service using http4s, Cats Effect, and MongoDB with a Protobuf-based API handling real-time event indexing, custom query DSL, and sub-second latency for blockchain data access
Designed comprehensive REST APIs for node management including secure key rotation, transaction signing, and configuration endpoints with strong data integrity guarantees
Created full-stack monitoring interfaces using React for transaction visualization and real-time blockchain data exploration, working across the entire stack from backend services to user experience

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Architected an event-sourced change order system with immutable audit trails and financial tracking, syncing with the company's enterprise resource management application using Kafka streams

Built a microservices-based architecture using C# and ASP.NET on Azure with MSSQL databases, implementing REST APIs serving thousands of concurrent users across construction project management workflows
Developed full-stack features spanning database modeling, backend services, and responsive Angular web interfaces with TypeScript and RxJS, delivering complete end-to-end solutions
Implemented a system for cross-entity referencing enabling complex relationships between submittals, RFIs, issues, documents, and change orders with strong referential integrity

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Built comprehensive test automation frameworks with C# interfaces for API validation and Selenium-based UI testing, enabling rapid delivery of quality assurance across the microservices architecture
Executed performance and load testing using JMeter and Locust to simulate thousands of concurrent users, identifying bottlenecks and validating system scalability under production-level traffic
Established quality processes and automated testing pipelines reducing production defects and accelerating release cycles
